RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 1 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 16600. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: POUR ME A DRINK gave chase and raced at a close disadvantage three wide on the turn, then dug in determinedly to edge out SOMESUGARNSPICE in the final yards. The latter pressured the pace inside, contested the turn two deep and dueled to even terms mid-stretch, but was outfinished in the final yards. THETA set a pressured pace, contested the edge at the rail on the turn, was met at even terms mid-stretch and relented later yards. SWIPE THAT CANDY came away slowly then picked up the chase inside, raced at the rail ont he turn and flattened in the lane. WAY OF APPEAL gave chase to no avail. SPIRIT ON THE WIND hesitated at the break then saved ground.

ENTRY.NAME: Somesugarnspice
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace inside,close off rail turn,outfinished final yards

ENTRY.NAME: Pour Me a Drink
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

ENTRY.NAME: Theta
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,rail turn,met 1/16,relented later yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Claiming Purse 10800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allowed 2 lbs. (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SARGENT KOBE saved ground on the first turn, started a bid leaving the three eighths pole and steadily improved, raced in the four path on the far turn, dueled for the lead mid-stretch and drew clear later yards. SENATOR KELLY exchanged light contact with Spectaculo leaving the gate then settled in the three path the first turn, bid past the three eighths pole, took the lead in the three path midway on the far turn but was met mid-stretch and relented the final sixteenth. GET OFF MY CLOUD rated a slim lead inside, was met at the seven sixteenths pole and dueled at even terms from that point, but dropped back at the rail approaching the quarter pole, dug in leaving the far turn and got up to recover third the final strides. NIGHT TRAIN WAYNE stalked three wide the first turn, dueled at mostly even terms leaving the seven sixteenths pole, was met midway on the far turn and flattened inside the eighth pole. EISELE saved ground on the first turn, picked up the chase past the three eighths pole, raced in the three path on the far turn and flattened into the lane. SPECTACULO exchanged contact with Senator Kelly leaving the gate then saved ground close to the early pace, gave chase past the three eighths pole but weakened at the rail on the far turn. FELICIAS CASTLE rated close in the four path the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the five path on the far turn and weakened in the lane.

ENTRY.NAME: Sargent Kobe
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,bid 3/8,4p far turn,up 1/16,cleared later yards

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Spectaculo
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped break,saved ground,chased 3/8,weakened rail far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Get Off My Cloud
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated slim lead inside, met 7/16,dueled,dropped back 1/4,up 3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 3 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Claiming Purse 16600. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500, if for $10,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MO EH HENNESSY took an immediate lead and angled to the inside to set the pace, came under pressure leaving the quarter pole, raced at the rail on the turn and was kept alert in the lane. GLASTONBURY gave chase, rounded the turn near the rail then dueled through the stretch and cleared second. COMO ESTAS gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the three path and was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. STOOPS SINE DIE gave chase, rounded the turn off the rail, eased out leaving the turn and showed little more. SOUTHERN SAINT gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn near the rail and showed little in the lane. SUPER JO hesitated leaving the gate, angled to the outside to give chase and raced off the rail on the turn. IPNOPS gave chase and rounded the turn about the three path.

ENTRY.NAME: Stoops Sine Die
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased,off rail turn,eased out 1/8,little in lane

ENTRY.NAME: Mo Eh Hennessy
ENTRY.OWNER: Fanelli John and Longball Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: immediate lead,set pace inside,pressured 1/4,rail turn,kept alert

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE DECEMBER 6, 2022. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 6, 2022 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TAPPIN ROYALTY rated close inside, started a bid approaching the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn off the rail, dug in for the lead mid-stretch and edged clear later yards. NO FOOLING DUDE rated a short lead inside, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole and inched clear past the quarter pole, rounded the far turn at the rail, was met mid-stretch and ceded later yards. MOON OVER MONTANA saved ground off the pace on the opening turn, eased out into the backstretch and gave chase past the seven sixteenths pole, raced in the five path on the far turn and came along for third past the eighth pole. MAKE WAY stalked off the rail the first turn, gave chase leaving the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn about the four path, then flattened inside the eighth pole. SKILLFUL settled in the three path the first turn, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, rounded the far turn at the rail and showed little in the lane. ENVISION SUCCESS stalked from the three path the first turn, challenged leaving the three eighths pole but dropped back passing the quarter pole, rounded the far turn in the three path and weakened. MACY'S BOY raced off the pace in the three path the first turn and showed little response through the backstretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Tappin Royalty
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated close inside,bid 3/8,off rail far turn,up 1/16,clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Make Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked off rail,chased 3/4,4p far turn,flattened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 5 7F Dirt CR: 61. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since November 6 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,500, allow ed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: APPEALING ROAD saved ground off the pace, bid nearing the three eighths pole and took the lead two deep approaching the quarter pole, contested the edge inside on the far turn and dug in determinedly to hold off the stretch challenge of DIVA ROSE, who rounded the first turn about the four path, left the turn outside and gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, steadily improved and raced close in the three path on the far turn and dueled through the stretch to hold second. JACKYSINTHECASTLE raced in the three path the first turn, picked up the chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole, contested at a close disadvantage in the four path on the far turn but was outfinished in the stretch duel for second. LADY SPARROW saved ground off the pace, gave chase leaving the seven sixteenths pole but was hemmed in approaching the quarter, raced off the rail on the far turn then weakened in the lane. GLOBAL EMPRESS rated the pace inside, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole, was met at the rail approaching the quarter pole and weakened on the far turn. PETTYFORURTHOUGHTS stalked two deep the first turn, gave chase nearing the seven sixteenths pole but faded into the far turn. ELLIES AT WINDSOR rounded the opening turn about the three path, showed no response leaving the turn, was eased passed the three eighths pole and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Global Empress
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,met near 1/4,weakened far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Sparrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground,chased 7/16,hemmed in near 1/4,off rail turn,weaken

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 6 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 93. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 25000. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race Since November 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since October 6 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Races Where Entered For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CANDY INVASION settled off the pace in the two and three paths, started a bid leaving the three eighths pole and raced in range of the lead about the three path on the far turn, dug in under steady handling and got up the final yards. AUBURN MILL rated the pace inside, came under pressure leaving the three eighths pole and rounded the far turn near the rail, dug in under steady encouragement leaving the turn but gave up the lead in the final yards. REY O REYES stalked off the rail, gave chase from the three eighths pole and raced close in the three path on the far turn, but flattened stride nearing mid-stretch. MASTER THIS saved ground off the pace, gave chase leaving the half mile pole, rounded the far turn near the rail and weakened. BUFF'S EYE VIEW settled in the two and three paths, gave chase nearing the three eighths pole, rounded the far turn about the five path and weakened. KAYLEE'S SPITFIRE rounded the turns in the four and five paths and showed little response.

ENTRY.NAME: Auburn Mill
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated pace inside,pressured 3/8,rail far turn,caught final yards

ENTRY.NAME: Rey O Reyes
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 7 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Allowance Purse 27400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, WAIVER CLAIMING, RESTRICTED OR STATE BRED RACES OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners O f A Race Since November 6 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since October 6 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances)(W V A Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BLACK PANDA accelerated to the lead nearing the five sixteenths pole and rated the pace, was urged clear at the quarter pole, raced at the rail through the far turn and held well under steady handling. HONEY BELLA gave chase outside, raced in the five path on the turn and dueled through later yards for second. KEEP ON SPURRIN gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the three path and dug in to take third later yards while outfinished for second. WITNESS THE ENERGY contested the early pace with a slim lead then gave chase approaching the five sixteenths pole, raced close in the three path on the turn but flattened stride inside the sixteenth pole. CEDAR'S WISH was unprepared for the break then gave chase, raced in the four path on the turn and finished evenly to pass rivals. PHANTOM QUEEN gave chase through the backstretch, raced near the rail on the turn and weakened nearing mid-stretch. ONLY KIDDING was shuffled back on the chute then gave chase toward mid track, raced in the four path on the turn and passed rivals outside. AMERICAN BOUND gave chase toward mid track, raced two deep on the turn and weakened in the lane. RUNNING FREE gave chase toward the outside, rounded the turn about the four path but was pulled up sore and vanned off post race.

ENTRY.NAME: Only Kidding
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back chute,chased,4p turn,passed rivals outside

ENTRY.NAME: Honey Bella
ENTRY.OWNER: Pesaturo Gus and Joy Kevin J
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased outside,5p turn,dug in lane,dueled 2nd later yards

RACE.RACE_TEXT: CHARLES TOWN RACE 8 4 1/2F Dirt CR: 46. Maiden Claiming Purse 13000. FOR ACCREDITED WEST VIRGINIA-BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOG TOWN ALLEN set a pressured pace and contested the edge off the rail on the turn, was met passing the eighth pole but dug in determinedly to eke out the advantage over METALLIC CAT in later yards. The latter pressured pace inside, raced at a close disadvantage nearest the rail on the turn, took a slim lead passing the eighth pole and dueled gamely, but was outfinished later yards. JUBA'S MOCHA gave chase through the backstretch, rounded the turn in the four path, left the turn outside, dueled through the stretch and took third under the wire. LITTLE RICHIE chased through the backstretch, raced at the rail on the turn then eased out into the lane and was outfinished in the stretch duel for third. LAST PARTY pressured the pace through the backstretch but dropped back approaching the quarter pole, raced in the three path on the turn and flattened late stretch. GETTIN SPICY gave chase inside, raced at the rail on the turn and ran evenly to late stretch before flattening stride. JUBA'S YANKEE ONE chased through the backstretch, rounded the turn about the three path and flattened late yards. CHARTERED COURSE gave chase to no avail. NOVEMBER IMPERIUM raced well back. SENZA STRIKE came away awkwardly then steadied leaving the gate and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Metallic Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Brown Nicole and Brown Ronney W
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed,rail turn,slim lead past 1/8,game to late lane,outfinishd

ENTRY.NAME: Gettin Spicy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside,rail turn,evenly to late lane,flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Dog Town Allen
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,edge off rail turn,met 1/8,determined effort

ENTRY.NAME: Last Party
ENTRY.OWNER: Don't Chasem Replacem Racing and Armstrong Katina M
